ValidationRule.description: Created for YODA. Fields that are required for the "Negotiate" stage of Opportunities in the "Product" record type.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( NOT( $Setup.Bypass_Settings__c.Bypass_Validation_Rules__c ), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Product', OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Negotiate')), /* ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName),'Negotiate'), */
OR ( ISBLANK(Customer_PO_Received__c), NOT(PO_Approved__c), NOT( Order_Entry_Approved__c), ISBLANK(Order_Entry_Date__c), ISBLANK(SO_Number__c), ISBLANK( Quotation_Issued__c), NOT(Export_Control_Check__c), ISBLANK(Quotation_Number__c), NOT(Proposal_price_Authorized__c), ISPICKVAL(Competition_Positioning__c,""), ISBLANK( RFQ_Received_Date__c), ISBLANK(Application__c), ISPICKVAL(Category_of_interest__c,""), ISBLANK( End_User__c), ISBLANK(Amount) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: To mark Stage as 'Negotiate' or 'Closed Won' these fields must be populated: Customer PO Received, PO Approved, Order Entry Approved, Order Entry Date and SO Number with "Propose / Quote", "Develop" and "Qualify(SQL)" stages required fields.
